img_above_text:
![Wukong Pagoda 12.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/6a/Wukong_Pagoda_12.jpg)
The interior tunnel will end with a sealed cell gate, as well as a Starved Abomination that will try to ambush you from a corner. Let the creature tire itself out swinging wildly with its sickle before taking it down with just a few hits.
img_below_text:
If you head along the outside path, you'll find another open jail cell bars to re-enter the interior hall and reach another green Wisp, but be ready to deal with the ambushing Cyan Bat above and Abomination below.
![Wukong Pagoda 14.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e4/Wukong_Pagoda_14.jpg)

content.text:

The interior tunnel will end with a sealed cell gate, as well as a Starved Abomination that will try to ambush you from a corner. Let the creature tire itself out swinging wildly with its sickle before taking it down with just a few hits."
            - Following Text: "If you head along the outside path, you'll find another open jail cell bars to re-enter the interior hall and reach another green Wisp, but be ready to deal with the ambushing Cyan Bat above and Abomination below.
![Wukong Pagoda 14.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e4/Wukong_Pagoda_14.jpg)"

img_summary: The image depicts a dark, ominous tunnel ending with a sealed cell gate, where a Starved Abomination is seen hanging upside down, ready to ambush. This scene illustrates a tense moment in the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where players must navigate through dangerous areas and deal with lurking enemies. The preceding text advises players on how to handle the ambush, while the following text suggests further exploration and encounters ahead.
